admiration: You have my full respect for that.

love: That sounds like a very special connection.

optimism: It is good to keep a positive outlook.
pride: You have every right to be proud.
relief: That must be a huge weight off your shoulders.

anger: I can hear how frustrated you are.

disappointment: It is really hard when things do not go as planned.

disapproval: It sounds like you are not a fan of that.
